item.description:
Bob and Dave invite you to their first (and last) "It’s the end of the World As we know it" Party at a remote location. What better way to spend your last living moments that with liberty activists.

BYOB, FOOD, BODY BAG, chips & dips, H2O, disposable utensils, cups, plates etc...

parking & sleeping space in the house is limited. Please RSVP with Nga so we can make sure we got enough spaces for everyone. Contact her at 774-262-2729. Please txt her your name, # of people coming, what you'll be bringing. This way we won't end up having double or triple of the same item. Looking forward to see all you awesome liberty peeps!


3pm til rapture

272 Turnpike Rd Grafton NH
item.name: Bob & Dave's "It’s the end of the World As we know it" Party
